title: Cloud Solutions Architect
description: We are looking for a Cloud Solutions Architect to design and oversee our global cloud infrastructure strategy. You will be responsible for defining architectural standards, evaluating new cloud services, and ensuring the scalability, security, and cost-effectiveness of our platform. Your role involves collaborating with engineering teams to migrate legacy systems, implement multi-cloud strategies, and optimize resource utilization. Deep expertise in AWS, Azure, or GCP is required, along with professional certifications. You should have a proven track record of designing high-availability systems and a deep understanding of cloud-native patterns and governance.
